channel.title: The secret king
channel.description:
Make king secret. When he is voted up, he will get the option to reveal himself as king and immediately gt off the stand (though he could be revoted)
Abilities:
>**Royal finger** A message will be announced that "the king has put an extra vote on (x)." This works even if you are not accusing anyone. **Decide fate** Immediately become open king, otherwise the same **Guards!** Still 4 uses **Allies** Still 4 uses
After they are outed through trial, they become the open king, with the crown and everything. A new person rising to king ship is automatically an open king
butler cannot poison a secret king prince can jail secret king but not open king
-----
Optional:
starting king is always BD, but can be converted until eh becomes open king
Other option:
starting king is always neutral, cannot be converted, is not revealed from decide fate
